review: ***The way she examines and explains everything is really commendable.***I couldn't have felt more comfortable with any other doctor for all of my pregnancy scans. Also while checking current patient, she makes sure her next patients are not waiting unnecessarily in line for long but that also doesn't mean she will overlook current patient. She checks everything and explains those at the end very well.Really liked this that she respects everyone s time and the slot they have booked her for. Giving the feedback after all of my 4 Pregnancy scans. Thank you so much Dr Reshma :)

I had done all my pregnancy scans done by Dr. Reshma in Manipal Hospital. Such a patient Dr. She very patiently did the scan with lot of dedication. Sister divya and others also was very kind and patient. Highly recommended this Dr!!

review: It's because of  her detailed analysis I had a safe conservative preterm delivery.  Doctor was friendly

review: Reshma Mam is most humble and gracious in treating the patients. She is very dedicative and keen while scaning pregnancy patients. She does her job very carefully and thoroughly. I strongly recommend the doctor for all the pregnancy scans.
